title: Unable to login to account
description: Customer reports 'invalid credentials' after entering correct password. Happens on mobile app and web.

title: Order not appearing in order history
description: shows as completed in payment gateway but not in user's order history.

title: App crashes on launch (Android)
description: Several users report crash immediately after opening the app on Android 12 devices.

title: Refund not processed
description: Customer requested refund 7 days ago but refund status still pending in admin panel.

title: Feature request: bulk invoice export
description: Request to add CSV export for invoices with date-range filter and status columns.

title: Slow page load on product listing
description: Product listing page takes 8-10 seconds to load for users with large carts.

title: Incorrect tax calculation at checkout
description: Taxes are applied twice for some shipping regions causing order total mismatch.

title: Email notifications not sending
description: Transactional emails (order confirmation) not being delivered to users with Yahoo addresses.

title: UI overlap on small screens
description: Checkout button overlaps promo input on screens smaller than 360px.

title: Password reset email link expired instantly
description: Users report password reset link showing expired immediately after generation.

title: Search returns irrelevant results
description: Search queries return unrelated products; fuzzy matching seems broken after last deploy.

title: Two-factor authentication not optional
description: Users cannot opt out of 2FA even when the setting is turned off in profile.
